About Me

As a versatile student pursuing a degree in Design (Digital Media), I've had several opportunities to work on diverse projects that highlight my conceptual and technical proficiency. A standout personal project involved managing the design and development of a hotel website. This initiative significantly boosted online presence and drove a notable 25% increase in conversion rates, garnering positive feedback. These experiences underscore my commitment to exploring diverse mediums and endless possibilities in digital design while maintaining a stellar academic record with a 3.8 GPA. Success, for me, lies in continuous learning, adaptability, and the pursuit of knowledge through experimentation and iteration.
